Articles.Content: i was early into a career, but i was confident to make my way to the mun, but, i only had one maned capsules to use, and i didn't want Jeb getting all the attention! so, i had stuck 3 Mk 1 command pods on top of each other, and made my way to the mun and back, now they all insist on showing us family mun pictures....... Have you ever wanted more than 1 kerbal to take the glory, but your capsules were the size on a door frame?
yes. that is why i go realism and end up going to the mun on year 2. between every flight, i warp 10-20 days, and that's not even true realism, which would've been year 16.
